final_response.subject: Hermes - Delivering divine fashion | We're here to assist you
final_response.response_body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to Hermes - Delivering divine fashion!

We understand you might be interested in exploring our unique collections. We're here to help you discover the perfect piece or answer any questions you might have.

To assist you best, could you please share a little more about what you're looking for? Perhaps a specific item, a type of product, or any particular style you have in mind?

In the meantime, we invite you to immerse yourself in the world of Hermes by visiting our official website or one of our boutiques.

We eagerly await your reply and look forward to helping you find something truly divine!

Best regards,
Hermes - Delivering divine fashion
